pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily Encrypt and Decrypt Data Frame/Tibble Columns or Files using RSA Public/Private Keys // It is important to ensure that sensitive data is protected. This straightforward package is aimed at the end-user. Strong RSA encryption using a public/private key pair is used to encrypt data frame or tibble columns. A public key can be shared to allow others to encrypt data to be sent to you. This is particularly aimed a healthcare settings so patient data can be pseudonymised.
